job_description:
• Senior Vice President - Software Engineering - Trading Tech Jersey City, NJ, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Senior Vice President of Software Engineering to lead and actively participate in the development of our innovative multi-asset trading platform on AWS.
• This role demands a hands-on leader with deep expertise in streaming, non-blocking, reactive Java programming, and a strong background in microservices architecture, domain-driven design, and cloud technologies.
• Lead Software Engineer - Agentic AI/Machine Learning GLASGOW, LANARKSHIRE, United Kingdom TechnologySoftware Engineering Lead Software Engineer - Agentic AI/Machine Learning Lead Solution Engineer - Lead Software Engineer - AI/ML, GenAI and Data Technology Jersey City, NJ, United States and 3 more TechnologySoftware Engineering Design and implement data solutions to boost customer experience and operational efficiency in Consumer and Community Banking.
• Principle Software Engineer Palo Alto, CA, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Principal AI/ML and Gen AI Engineer to join our dynamic team at CCB COSMIC.
• Sr Director of Software Engineering (Data Platforms) Palo Alto, CA, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering Direct multiple technical areas, manage the activities of multiple departments, and collaborate across technical domains Software Engineer III - Surveillance Product - Backend Engine - AWS + Elastic / Open Search Bengaluru, Karnataka, India TechnologySoftware Engineering You'll work on compliance products to turn complex regulatory requirements into highly scalable, auditable and intelligent systems Software Engineer III - Full Stack + AWS + Elastic / Open Search Plano, TX, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering We have an exciting and rewarding opportunity for you to take your software engineering career to the next level.
• Manager of Software Engineering – Data Engineering Mumbai, Maharashtra, India TechnologySoftware Engineering Lead multiple teams, manage day-to-day implementation activities, and set overall guidance for team output, practices and collaboration Lead Software Engineer Wilmington, DE, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering Shape technology strategy and drive impactful projects in a dynamic environment using C++, PySpark/Scala, AWS Sr Director of Software Engineering - Data Jersey City, NJ, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering Direct multiple technical areas, manage the activities of multiple departments, and collaborate across technical domains Big Data Software Engineer - Python Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina and 1 more TechnologySoftware Engineering Big Data Software Engineer with skills and experience implementing large-scale, cloud platform processing internal a and third-party da AI Lead Software Engineer - Machine Learning Columbus, OH, United States and 1 more TechnologySoftware Engineering Develop critical machine learning solutions across multiple technical areas as an integral part of an agile team Senior Lead Software Engineer Jersey City, NJ, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering Drive significant business impact and tackle a diverse array of challenges that span multiple technologies and applications Lead Software Engineer - Applied AI/ML Python Engineer LONDON, LONDON, United Kingdom TechnologySoftware Engineering Promote innovation as a Lead Software Engineer, leading projects with Python, Kubernetes, and AWS expertise.
• Senior Lead Software Engineer - Data Lake / Terraform / AWS Jersey City, NJ, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering Carry out critical tech solutions across multiple technical areas as an integral part of an agile team Senior Lead Software Engineer - Databricks Jersey City, NJ, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering Drive significant business impact and tackle a diverse array of challenges that span multiple technologies and applications Director of Software Engineering- TPM Jersey City, NJ, United States TechnologySoftware Engineering Manage complex tech programs at a leading firm, driving innovation and success with expert skills Sr Director of Software Engineering - Head of Cloud/Lake Platforms Engineering Plano, TX, United States and 4 more TechnologySoftware Engineering As the leader of this team, you will play a crucial role in our cloud migration, a key component of our modernization strategy.
• You will build and lead a highly skilled engineering organization focused on creating resilient compute and storage platforms that scale with JPMC’s business needs, while accelerating the development of data and AI-centric solutions.
